CustomField.formula: IF (ISNULL(DATEVALUE(Date_Mapping_Complete__c )), (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Date_Chart_Of_Accounts_Received__c ) - 2*( FLOOR((TODAY() - DATE(1985,6,24))/7) -FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Date_Chart_Of_Accounts_Received__c ) - DATE(1985,6,24))/7))), ((DATEVALUE(Date_Mapping_Complete__c)) - DATEVALUE(Date_Chart_Of_Accounts_Received__c ) - 2*( FLOOR(((DATEVALUE(Date_Mapping_Complete__c) - DATE(1985,6,24))/7) - FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Date_Chart_Of_Accounts_Received__c ) - DATE(1985,6,24))/7)))))
CustomField.label: Days Since Chart of Accts Rec'd
